abstract: The federal government reversed course and said Wednesday it would continue to cover the use of an increasingly popular procedure to detect heart disease.
snippet: The federal government reversed course and said Wednesday it would continue to cover the use of an increasingly popular procedure to detect heart disease.
lead_paragraph: Reversing a proposed decision issued in December, the federal government said Wednesday it would continue to cover the use of an increasingly popular procedure to detect heart disease.

headline.main: Heart Scans Still Covered by Medicare
headline.print_headline: Heart Scans Still Covered By Medicare
